title: S&P 500 Posts First Back-to-Back Loss of 2026 After PPI Data
description: A slide in US stocks continued Wednesday as a flurry of economic data failed to change any expectations for the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path and traders digest the latest round of big bank earnings.
content: A slide in US stocks continued Wednesday as a flurry of economic data failed to change any expectations for the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path and traders digest the latest round of big bank earnings.
